title: Quiz-related Entertainment/Sweepstake message is being classfied as 'Not a UCC' by TSPs
selftext:
1. Are TSPs under duress or coercion to allow this message to be allowed to all citizens without prosecuting it under DND framework? 
2. In what ways it classifies as Transactional and/or Administration and/or Critical Alert message? TSPs dismiss DND complaint as Not a UCC
3. At least half a dozen alerts are being pushed within the first half of the week itself from almost same Sender ID.

​

https://preview.redd.it/363lrwzpgpcc1.png?width=717&format=png&auto=webp&s=a22b1215fd1a96ece9bd57b5efd9b6e3fd7d6474
